entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the evening. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 18 February 2023
